title: ‘Succession’ Is Back and Better Than Ever | The Watch
description:
Apple Plus has finally released a teaser trailer for their flagship series ‘The Morning Show,’ and we still have a lot of questions (2:12). ‘Succession’ is back for its second season and it looks like there won’t be any slow starts this time around (14:48). Plus: our ‘Succession’ aftershow, ‘Number One Boys’ (28:48).

Host: Chris Ryan
Guests: Andy Greenwald and Jason Concepcion

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
